Name: Expeditious Messenger
Languages: one language spoken by its creator
Traits: Flyby. The messenger doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach. Telepathic Bond. While the messenger is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.
Actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
